title: Regarding the IoT cameras used and compatible tools:
tool-1-textA: We use the Edge AI camera 'Vieureka'
tool-1-textB: This camera eliminates the need for an image analysis server, making it easy to expand the system by simply adding more cameras.
tool-2-text: Our system is compatible with 'MotionBoard', a Business Intelligence (BI) tool provided by WingArc1st Inc. This integration allows for data visualization, enabling clear and shared information among users.
